step_data.thought: Looking at the page, I can see we're on the edit page for the 'General Retail Customers' customer group. I need to check the current state of the 'Excluded Website(s)' listbox. I see that 'Main Website' is already selected in this listbox (selected=True). In this context, when a website is selected in the 'Excluded Website(s)' listbox, it means that website is already excluded from the customer group. Since 'Main Website' is already selected, it's already excluded from this customer group. The goal has already been accomplished, so I should inform the user.
step_data.action: stop('The Main Website is already excluded from this customer group. I can see that "Main Website" is already selected in the "Excluded Website(s)" listbox, which means it is already excluded. No further action is needed.')
